name: hello-openai
title: Try Azure OpenAI
description: This tutorial shows how to deploy your own GPT 3.5 model on Azure and explore the features of OpenAI Playground in Azure Toolkit for IntelliJ.

phases.title: Sign-in
phases.description: Sign in with your Azure account

phases.title: Select Subscription
phases.description: Select the subscription to deploy your GPT 3.5 model

phases.title: Prepare Resources
phases.description: Initialize OpenAI deployment with GPT 3.5 model or select an existing one

steps.title: Prepare GPT 3.5 deployment
steps.description: Create GPT 3.5 deployment and related account or select an existing one

phases.title: Congratulations!
phases.description: Your GPT 3.5 model has been deployed to Azure, enjoy your Azure OpenAI experience!
